product.name: Shower Drain, 2 in 1 Linear Shower Drain 24 Inch(Brushed Nickel), 304 Stainless Steel Shower Floor Drain with Tile Insert Grate,Adjustable Feet,Hair Filter
product.description:
At HTOH, we believe that a comfortable and relaxing shower experience begins with thoughtful design. As pioneers in the shower products industry, we are dedicated to developing highly functional, exceptional quality products.
Each product undergoes rigorous selection and testing to ensure the utmost safety and comfort.
Determine the location of the drain outlet，and measure the distance from the drain outlet to the surrounding walls. Any issues, please communicate with us immediately. Customer delight has always been our top priority.
product.bullet_points:
• ▶[Material] HTOH shower drain is mainly made of high-quality 304 stainless steel material,sturdy,rust-proof and wear-resistant. The surface of linear shower drain is brushed nickel process, which has stronger corrosion resistance and rust resistance.
• ▶[Two Decoration] Even though there is only one cap of long shower drain, you can get two decoration schemes. Stainless steel surface or embedded tile insert surface for your choice. The depth of the tile tray is 1/2 inch，and the length is 22.67 inches. Tile insert shower drain truly achieve visual barrier-free and invisible drainage.
• ▶[Large Displacement] The size of shower pan drain is 24"*2.75"*2.75". Compared with traditional small floor drain,its displacement is larger and water flow speed is up to 60L/min.In addition,the sink of shower liner drain adopts "X"-shaped design, which greatly improves the drainage speed and will not store water.
• ▶[Easy To Clean] Linear drain cover is removable, and you can use the metal hook to take out the built-in hair strainer. It can prevent hairs from falling into unfathomable sewer for an anti-clogging effect.
• ▶[Universal Design] Water outlet of shower drain brushed nickel is 2 inch,which fits US NO-HUB drain base system.Large displacement shower floor drain is suitable for drainage in bathrooms,kitchens,garages,basements.
• ▶[Adjustable Height] The leveling feets of the modern shower drain are adjustable,and the maximum adjustable height is 4-3/32". It can effectively solve the installation problem and prevent the linear shower drain 24 inch from being uneven with the floor level.
• ▶[Additional Thread Adapter] Thread adapter is used to connect flange and can be adjusted for height. Other brands do not include this part, you need to purchase separately.
• ▶[ Shower Drain Attention ] If you find any parts you need missing in the 24 in shower drain, please feel free to contact us, and we will send them to you for free.
